subtests.name: offlineContext = new OfflineAudioContext(1, 44100, 44100) did not throw an exception.
X p1 = offlineContext.suspend() incorrectly threw TypeError: "offlineContext.suspend is not a function".
X p1 instanceof Promise is not true. Got false.
p2 = offlineContext.resume() did not throw an exception.
After resume, offlineContext.state is equal to suspended.
p2 rejected correctly with NotSupportedError: Operation is not supported.
p3 = offlineContext.startRendering() did not throw an exception.
After close, offlineContext.state is equal to closed.
